metadata.name: 206 countries Single NFT with 10,000 children
metadata.description:
The only NFT that brings together 10,000 children from 206 countries.
I've worked on it for a long time. I brought together 10,000 children's photos that I tried to collect unique from each other. I had some dreams for children.
 I did a research for the hopes of children.
 I searched on the internet and found 206 countries.
 I wrote down each country's name one by one and collected 10,000 ten thousand unique children's photos.
 I selected 20 boxes in a program, placed each photo in this box, and made 500 of the 20 photos.
 I selected 20 again from 500 and created 25 of 400 photos each.
 Then I combined them into a unique piece and made a single piece from 10,000 to ten thousand children.
  400Ã—25=10,000 photos.
  This is something I've wanted to do for years and I want to thank everyone who has helped me achieve this dream.
       Resolution: 4096 pixels
       Every offer is a donation.
